Added official Empathy Ledger Syndication API client:
- src/lib/empathy-ledger-client.ts - JWT auth, story fetching, access logging

title: Story ownership and consent framework
description: Implement the cultural protocols and consent management for storytellers

comments.author: benknight
comments.text:
Implemented consent framework with 4 new modules:
- src/types/consent.ts - Comprehensive types for consent, sharing, cultural protocols
- src/lib/consent-manager.ts - Consent verification, request, grant, revoke workflows
- src/lib/story-sharing.ts - Visibility control, sharing, access logging
- src/lib/cultural-protocols.ts - Elder approval, cultural warnings, Indigenous data sovereignty
